snippet.title: Warriors Orochi 4: Ultimate - Hades, Achilles, and Ryu Hayabusa Reveal!
snippet.description:
Hades, the brother of Zeus and god of the Underworld, known for his cold demeanour as he rules over the dead, caring little about what happens in the world above until now, joining his brother Zeus in an anti-Odin coalition as they fight to discover the true purpose of Loki. 

Joining him in battle is the fearless fighter Achilles. Known as the mightiest warrior of the Greek army and the hero of the Trojan War, Achilles is feared by enemies and allies alike. He fights not just for victory, but for honour and fame. 

The third character joining the epic clash is not a god, but one of the most beloved ninjas in all of gaming, Ninja Gaiden’s Ryu Hayabusa.
